text:
indrA$gnI rOcaqnA diqvaH pariq vAjE#Shu BUShathaH | tadvA$M cEtiq pravIqrya$M || 
Snatha#d-vRuqtramuqta sa#nOtiq vAjaqmindrAq yO aqgnI sahu#rI sapaqryAt | 
iqraqjyantA# vasaqvya#syaq BUrEqH saha#stamAq saha#sA vAjaqyantA$ || 
pra ca#r.ShaqNiBya#H pRutanAq havE#Shuq pra pRu#thiqvyA ri#ricAthE diqvaSca# | 
pra sindhu#ByaqH pragiqriByO# mahiqtvA prEndrA$gnIq viSvAq BuvaqnA&tyaqnyA || 
maru#tOq yasyaq hi - [  ] 46
